title: NA summoned to meet on Wednesday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 22 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi has summoned the session of National Assembly to meet on July 27 (Wednesday) at the Parliament House.
The session will be held at 4 p.m. at the Parliament House, said a press release issued here Friday.
The president convened the session under Article 54 section (1) of the Constitution, it further said.
